about_the_game:
Is it a prayer or a curse...
And what is a human being? A hymn to humanity that questions the beauty of human beings.

---
For 3,000 years, the Moon Rabbit [Lewis] has looked down on the earth and painted portraits of great historical figures.
However, he passed away after "an event".
And he left behind a series of portraits.

Why did he, a being so close to God, die?
This is a story of "prayer and curse" of a lonely rabbit who paints his thoughts on a canvas.

More than 200 historical figures.

The disastrous yet beautiful historical figures [Effector Series] by Takahiro Tanaka, one of Japan's leading animation directors.
You can build your own deck by combining more than 200 great figures.

Theatrical interface built around a botanical steampunk worldview.

Everything in the interface exists as material that ties into the narrative and unfolds seamlessly without compromising the worldview.
It is as if you have wandered into a studio where no one knows you.
There are also events that unfold as if the interface were a theater.
Yose! Sing! Dance! Strip!!!

All quests are boss fights!

In addition to over 100 story quests, there will be daily quests and regular event quests. All of them are boss battles!

Various tactical skills like Shogi and dynamic warfare due to terrain and weather conditions.

The game makes full use of the unique skills of each effector, training, deck building, and tactics utilizing terrain and other factors.
The variety of aspects generated by placement and weather changes is appealing and allows you to build your own unique style of play.

Game controls are very simple.

Just use the mouse to make selections and place them on the board; the game design is suitable for both beginners and advanced players of RTS.

Recording and memory through memoirs and vinyl video.

As you complete quests, you will obtain "memoirs and vinyl videos," fragmentary evidence of the story.

When all is said and done, what will you see? Experience it for yourself.

short_description: ”Greats vs Greats.” Engage in 3-minute battles by summoning the Greats of history! Summon over 200 the Greats of history and slay your enemies with your dream team! Engage in this 3-minute tower-offense(RTS) game that is easy to control but not easy to triumph. Let the feast begin!
